name: SaphiRose Women's Long Hooded Rain Jacket Outdoor Raincoat Windbreaker
short_description: 【Size Recommend】: This raincoat has a relaxed fit which runs large. If you're not layering more, or prefer a slimmer fit, consider one size down. Model in picture is 5'9" (174 cm), 114.64 lbs (52kg), size small fits well. Note that size measurements refer to jacket itself, not body measurements.
【Material】: This rain jacket made of 100% polyester shell which is water-resistant, suits for traveling or walking in light rain. Soft lining make sure comfortable enough to wear.

【Special Design】: Saphirose jackets adjustable design with waist & hood drawstring, by tightening or loosening waist drawstring, helping it better fit different body shapes; Sturdy zipper and storm flap with snaps ensure long-lasting; Two snap pockets provide safe storage.

【Features】: It's a hip-length jacket with lined sleeves, weighs about 2lb(910g), which's a little heavy for those who like to keep it light. Feature bound seams inside, eliminating excess threads and preventing discomfort. You can hand wash or machine wash by low temperature, dry clean recommended.

【Occasions】: This coat is versatile, suitable for various activities such as daily wear, camping, hiking, biking, climbing, picnicking, walking, traveling, dog-walking, watching ball games, and other outdoor sports and activities.

name: Steve Madden Rain Jacket Women - Waterproof with Hood Anorak Rain Coats for Women Windbreaker Plus Size XS-3X
product_description: Stay protected in style with this lightweight waterproof coat designed for women who need dependable coverage in unpredictable weather. Made with a high-quality shell that repels moisture, this breathable rain jacket keeps you dry without trapping heat. Whether you’re walking the dog, heading to work, or exploring a new city, this travel raincoat women option offers a flattering fit and lasting comfort. Its all weather raincoat construction and modern cut mean you’ll look put-together while staying prepared for sudden showers. Practical features make this piece as functional as it is stylish. The adjustable waist coat design allows you to customize the fit, while the hood provides added coverage on windy days. The sturdy zipper and snap closure ensure a secure seal against the elements, making it a true stormproof outerwear staple. Lightweight yet durable, this ladies hiking jacket is perfect for outdoor adventures, from camping trips to neighborhood strolls. For those who love versatility, it doubles as a weather resistant parka that transitions seamlessly from casual outings to more polished looks. Every detail has been crafted with both performance and aesthetics in mind. The stylish rainwear women love often lacks true utility, but this design delivers on both fronts. A zip front raincoat closure makes it quick to put on and take off, while the long hooded coat silhouette provides added coverage when you need it most. Whether worn as a sport rain jacket on active days or a refined waterproof overcoat women can wear to work, this piece will become a go-to in your wardrobe. From weekday commutes to weekend hikes, it’s the perfect blend of protection, comfort, and timeless style.
